label: Primary Navigation
prompt_text: The app homepage is a stack of category sections, each containing a grid of cards. Each category answers the question: 'What am I trying to create right now?' Examples include Anatomy & Poses, Facial Dynamics, Apparel & Textile, Macro & Product, and Cinematography.
constraints: Categories are always visible on scroll
Categories are never hidden behind filters
Each category clearly shows how many modules it contains

label: Grid Card Layout
prompt_text: All prompts are displayed as grid cards. Think of each card as: 'One ready-to-use visual system.' The grid is designed to be the primary interaction model of the app.
constraints: Cards are displayed in a clean, evenly spaced grid
All cards are equal size
The grid is easy to scan visually
Cards never overlap or resize unexpectedly

label: Card Content
prompt_text: Each grid card contains a Category Tag, Prompt Name, Short Description, and a Copy Icon. Descriptions explain what the user will get, avoid technical jargon, and use simple, visual language.
constraints: Entire card is clickable
Hover state clearly shows interactivity
Cards feel safe to click (no surprise actions)

label: Prompt Detail View
prompt_text: Clicking a card opens a detail view explaining what the prompt creates, typical use cases, and available options. It includes a Prompt Overview Panel, Variation Selector, Frame Grid (01-06), and a Primary Action Button to Deploy Full Contact Sheet.
constraints: Variations change the vibe, not the structure
Variations never break the grid or layout
Switching variations should feel predictable, safe, and reversible
Frame tiles include frame number, short description, and copy button

label: Copy & Feedback Behavior
prompt_text: Copying is the core action of the app. Users must be able to copy the full prompt or individual frames. The UI must provide immediate visual confirmation.
constraints: Happen instantly
Show clear confirmation (checkmark, glow, or text change)
Never open pop-ups

label: Visual & Usability Standards
prompt_text: The aesthetic uses a dark background with metallic chrome surfaces and neon-lime highlights. Typography uses Orbitron for headings and Switzer for body text. The app follows Nielsen Norman Group principles for obvious actions and consistent feedback.
constraints: Animations must feel smooth, calm, and premium
No flashy or distracting effects
Use a golden-ratio type scale
Prioritize readability over decoration
Make actions obvious and keep interactions consistent
